channel.title: Music – Stevie B
channel.description: Recent content in Stevie B on Music

item.title: Stevie B - Because I Love You
item.description:
작곡: Stevie B / 작사: Words & Music by
KY: 8332 / KY: 7901

I got your letter
from the postman
Just the other day
so I decided to
Write this song
just let you know
Exactly the way I feel
to let you know
My loves forever
because I love you
Now do anything
I’ll give you my heart
My everything
because I love you
I’ll be right
by your side
To be your love
to be your guide
If you should feel
that I don’t
Really care
and that’s you’re
Staring to
loose ground
Just let me
really show you
That you can
count on me
And that I’ll always
be around
Because I love you
my heart is
An open door
girl won’t you please
Come on in
because I love you
I’ll be right
by your side
To be your love
to be your guide-

If you should feel
that I don’t
Really care
and that’s you’re
Staring to
loose ground
Just let me
really show you
That you can
count on me
That I’ll always
be around
Because I love you
my heart is
An open door
girl won’t you please
Come on in
because I love you
I’ll be right
by your side
To be your love
to be your guide-
